about_the_game:
Adds "Little Master's Mercy" and "Master's Expectation".

Little Master's Mercy
Earn items that give you experience points in the extra dungeon "Where the Demi-Fiend was Born".

Master's Expectation
Earn items that give you money in the extra dungeon "Center of the Conception".

*You can access the dungeons from the Terminal after reaching Ginza.

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of violence, including killing, are depicted, though the use of blood and gore is minimal. Some character designs are provocative. Dialogue uses expletives from time to time.
